CustomField.formula: Total_PAX_Qty__c * IF( NOT(ISBLANK( Deal__c )) , VALUE(TEXT(Deal__r.PAX_included_per_deal__c)) , IF(NOT(ISBLANK( DealID_from_Option__c )), VALUE(text(options__r.Deal__r.PAX_included_per_deal__c)) , VALUE(text(sub_options__r.options__r.Deal__r.PAX_included_per_deal__c)) ))
CustomField.label: Total PAX Sold
